inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getDocument.

documentFormat.description: Returns the document in the specified format. The document format can be either `JSON`, `YAML` and `TEXT`. JSON is the default format.

documentVersion.description: Document version for which you want information.

name.description: Name of the Systems Manager document.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getDocument.

arn.description: ARN of the document. If the document is an AWS managed document, this value will be set to the name of the document instead.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
